summary.Title: Sushi chefs for Yo! Sushi in CPH Airport

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Sushi chefs for Yo! Sushi in CPH Airport
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to send travelers from all over the world on their way with good Japanese food in their stomachs and a smile on their lips? Do you have experience with making sushi? Then we want you on our team when we open YO! Sushi again at CPH airport.

We offer:

  • A job with high quality produce
  • A day full of variations, with guests from all over the world
  • Great teamwork with friendly and fun co-workers
  • Collective agreement, pension, health insurance and on time salary
  • Varying working hours in a year-round business
  • To be part of SSP, an international company with the possibility to grow within the organization

Who are you?

  • You take pride in your work and strive to deliver great food
  • You have experience in making sushi
  • You are not afraid to take responsibility and you like to work independently
  • You speak and understand English and have knowledge of a Scandinavian language
  • You have a clean criminal record according to The Ministry of Transportation bek. 797 https://www.retsinformation.dk/eli/ita/2004/797

Yo! Sushi:

YO! Sushi has been serving guests Japanese food since 1997 based on the three F’s: Fun, Fast, Fresh and is known for delivering food almost directly into our guest’s mouths via conveyor belts. The menu includes classic Japanese dishes and foremost sushi and sashimi

What is SSP Denmark?

SSP Denmark is part of Select Service Partners and have been experts in food on the go for 60 years. Every year, our restaurants and lounges are visited by thousands of guests from all corners of the world who all wants a good food experience, fast service, and in a nice atmosphere.

Want to work with us?

Please send your application and CV through the link https://www.sspjob.dk/jobs/1739593-sushi-chefs-for-yo-sushi-at-cph-airport?promotion=401459-trackable-share-link-jobnet

We are excited to get started again, so we have ongoing interviews, and we will close for applications once we have found our new colleagues.

If you have questions about the position, contact Unit Manager Ronnie Andersen, ronnie.andersen@ssp.dk We are looking forward to hearing from you!
